resources.string: Show a pop-up hint at the start of the level
Travel through time, create endless possibilities
Modular Editing: Manage level modules and events modularly for fast configuration.
Multi-mode Support: Supports “I am Zombie”, “Can Cracking”, “Unbreakable”, Zombie King battle, etc.
Custom Injection: Inject and manage custom zombies, edit their base properties.
Auto Check: Detect missing dependencies and broken references to prevent crashes.
Resource Preview: Built-in plant, zombie, obstacle icons; WYSIWYG editing experience.

Z-Editor is a visual level editor designed specifically for PVZ2. It solves the cumbersome and error-prone process of directly editing JSON files, providing an intuitive interface for level configuration.

1. Directory setup: On first launch, click the folder icon in the top-right corner to select the JSON level files directory.
2. Import/New: Click a list item to edit an existing level, or use the bottom-right button to create a new level from a template.
3. Module management: In the editor, use "Add New Module" to extend level features.
4. Save: After editing, click the save button in the top-right corner to automatically write changes back to the original JSON file.
For questions or feedback, join the QQ group 562251204.
星寻, metal海枣, 超越自我3333, 桃酱, 凉沈, 小小师, 顾小言, PhiLia093, 咖啡, Anonymous
